data.description: Check data and variable properties and value
data.similar: Test::More and friends, although this module has different tests
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
the functions in these modules encapsulate common tests i use in
    the .t files. now that i've wrapped them in a Test::Builder sorta
    thing, they move a lot of code out of the .t files and into places
    where i don't have to see it. :)
